The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 October is 612,846 (1,088.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 14 October, there were 93,032 new confirmed cases (165.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 October, there were 85,758 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% ( 7,274 extra cases).
